intro: Hedraiostylus glaberrimus, commonly known as the smooth-styled hedra, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Orchidaceae, commonly known as the orchid family. The plant is characterized by its small, delicate flowers that typically bloom in shades of white and green. Its leaves are usually lance-shaped and arranged in a basal rosette. Hedraiostylus glaberrimus is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and mountainous regions.
